cause.description:
We have been working on creating Woodstock 2009. Wew have got bands, we are getting land, and we are rocking this thing. We want three days of fun and music and nothing but fun and music.
We need your help!
1. We love music.
2. We like to get groovy.
cause.mission: Create the best concert in 40 years.
cause.name: Woodstock 2009
